rules_text:
If an opponent was dealt combat damage this turn, you may pay {B}{B} rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Ward–Pay 2 life. [i](Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays 2 life.)[/i]
At the beginning of your end step, if an opponent was dealt combat damage this turn, you may draw a card.
